claims.object: Physical contact between two or more proteins
Dynamic protein interactions can be lipid-mediated

surface_layer.definition: The binding of two or more proteins to form a complex.

deep_layer.mechanism: Proteins interact via various forces, including hydrophobic interactions, hydrogen bonds, and electrostatic interactions.
deep_layer.origin: Proteins interact for various functions, such as signal transduction and structural support.

epistemic_metadata.source: The spatial structure of cell signaling systems - PMC - PubMed Central
